property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your creatures that cost 4 or more get "speed attacker". ■ Your opponent's evolution creatures and your opponent's creatures that have "speed attacker" or "mach fighter" are put tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your hand, one into your mana zone and one into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or when this creature's "EX Life" shield leaves your shield zone, destroy all your opponent's non-multicolored creatures. ■ Your opponent can't cast non-multicolored spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature or is chosen by your opponent, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then your opponent discards a card at random from their hand. {SASAGALE} 4 (While summoning a Dispector, you may reduce its cost by 4. If you do, destroy this creature. That Dispector can't cost less than 0.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, look at the top card of your deck and add it to your hand or put it into your mana zone.
